subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|ムジナ}} {{wp|Mujina}} [[File:Wakan Sansai Zue - Mujina.jpg|thumb|A '''{{m|ja||狢|tr=mujina}}''' from the ''{{m|ja||和漢三才図会|tr={{w|Wakan Sansai Zue}}}}'']]
{{ja-kanjitab|むじな|yomi=k}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=むしな|-}}, first attested in the ''{{w|Kojiki}}'' (712 {{CE}}).

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|kyu=貉|むじな|ムジナ}}

# {{synonym of|lang=ja|穴熊|tr=anaguma|nodot=1|sort=むしな}}: a [[badger]]
# {{lb|ja|regional|sort=むしな}} {{synonym of|lang=ja|狸|tr=tanuki|nodot=1}}: a [[raccoon dog]]
#: from the similarity of its [[fur]] [[color]] compared to a ''badger''
# {{lb|ja|mythology|sort=むしな}} a ''{{ll|ja|妖怪|yōkai}}'' that [[shapeshift]]s and deceives humans

subSections.title: Proverbs
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|一つ穴の狢|ひとつ あな の むじな}}
* {{ja-r|同じ穴の狢|おなじ あな の むじな}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|kyu=貉|もじな}}

# {{lb|ja|regional|sort=もしな}} ''Same as'' {{m|ja||むじな|tr=mujina}} ''above''

subSections.title: Etymology 3
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|kyu=貉|うじな}}

# {{lb|ja|obsolete|sort=うしな}} ''Same as'' {{m|ja||むじな|tr=mujina}} ''above''
